description:
Trial Presentation Software

OnCue is the most reliable trial presentation software designed from the ground up by full-time trial presentation consultants.  Since 2014, OnCue has been used in thousands of trials of all sizes. OnCue is laser focused on creating the best presentation software available for the legal industryâ€”simple workflows, powerful tools, blazing fast presentation.
8 fixes since 4.5.1260

###What's New:

* Fixed: Exhibit stickers may not print from other apps
* Fixed: UI becomes unresponsive after app is inactive
* Fixed: Editing designation in transcript pane may not update playback position in tuner
* Fixed: Error changing designations while presenting: Exception of type 'OnCue.LockTimeoutException'...
* Fixed: Error removing lines from designation: Assertion failure: splitIndex is between...
* Fixed: MDB import may set incorrect video duration for multi-video transcripts
* Fixed: CMS import may set incorrect video duration for multi-video transcripts
* Fixed: Properties pane may unnecessarily save changes causing increased database I/O
